refnamediv.refpurpose: Flush (send) output handler return value, return active output buffer contents and turn off active output buffer

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
stringfalseob_get_flush
This function calls the output handler (with the
PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_FINAL
flag), flushes (sends) it's return value, returns the contents of the active output buffer and turns off the active output buffer.
ob_get_flush will fail without an active output buffer started with the
PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_REMOVABLE
flag.
ob_get_flush will flush (send) the return value of the output handler even if the active output buffer was started without the
PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_FLUSHABLE
flag.
